item.description:
DISCOUNT FOR DEAF: $10!

 

Hello ASL Enthusiasts!

WHAT: ASL Weekly Social
WHEN: Sunday, September 23, 2012
TIME: 1:30-when the performance finishes (it starts at 2:00)
WHO: ANYONE is welcome to come by and watch an interpreted performance for a good cause
WHY: To socialize, have fun, and enjoy chatting in ASL, and support Our Space, Inc.
WHERE: The Regent Theatre, in Arlington

See all event details and buy $25 tickets here: http://www.regenttheatre.com/details/the_goddess_diaries

This is a little different and fun! Our Space is a center for kids and teens who have/have had cancer. It's a great cause and the monologues sound very interesting and cool!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meeting at Starbucks before the performance, then going to see the performance! Look for signing people!
item.name: ASL WEEKLY SOCIAL ... watching The Goddess Diaries
